description: This file defines the UtilityPaymentMapper class, responsible for converting between UtilityPayment DTO objects and UtilityPaymentEntity objects, facilitating data transformation within the application.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentMapper
classes.description: A mapper class that extends BaseMapper to convert between UtilityPayment DTOs and UtilityPaymentEntity objects.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a UtilityPayment DTO into a UtilityPaymentEntity.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a UtilityPaymentEntity into a UtilityPayment DTO.
